System activity (e.g., keyboard/mouse in.Action: Identify all process creation events (Windows Event ID 4688) or other user activity logs on critical systems. Correlate these events with successful interactive logon events (Windows Event ID 4624, Logon Type 2 or 10) within a reasonable time window (e.g., 15 minutes). Flag system activity or process execution that occurs *without* a preceding interactive logon event.
